purpose: Facilitates seamless interaction between code editors and web browsers to enhance developer productivity.
principle: Integrates with code editors and uses browser extensions to provide context-aware suggestions and interactions.
reusability: Open-source and easily integrable with popular frameworks like React, Next.js, Vue, and Nuxt.js. Provides plugins for VSCode.
limitations: Currently in alpha, may have limited stability and feature set. Primarily supports popular JavaScript frameworks.
name: stagewise
description: What if Cursor, Github Copilot and Windsurf could actually interact with your browser?  ðŸ’¬ Comment on any DOM element ðŸ§  We send the real context to Windsurf âš¡ Save time manually selecting files  Setup in 30 seconds, fully open-source, works first prompt.  Supports every framework with first party support for React, Next.js, Vue and Nuxt.js
highlight: Enables interaction with the browser by integrating code editors and AI tools like Cursor, Github Copilot, and Windsurf.
